document_title: Viral fever: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Both viral and bacterial infections have many similar symptoms. So to diagnose viral fever, your doctor may try to rule out a bacterial infection by reviewing your symptoms and medical history, as well as performing blood tests or taking samples such as water. foam or body fluids.
subsection_title: sot sieu vi.json. How to diagnose viral fever
subsection_data:
sot sieu vi.json. How to diagnose viral fever
Both viral and bacterial infections have many similar symptoms. So to diagnose viral fever, your doctor may try to rule out a bacterial infection by reviewing your symptoms and medical history, as well as performing blood tests or taking samples such as water. foam or body fluids.
